title: Three bed villa in Galle
details:
Situated in an elevated position in a highly desirable suburb of Galle, this three bedroom villa is surrounded by jungle and has its own herbal and spice garden.  Currently operating as a holiday let, the villa is offered fully furnished and equipped.

The house is a sympathetic conversion of a traditional village house.  The air-conditioned accommodation includes living and dining areas, kitchen, three bedrooms each with a private bathroom.

Outside is a swimming pool, yoga place and a herbal and spice garden.

The villa is equipped with hot water, store rooms, a laundry and servants facilities.
